house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1994 has 9 bedroom(s), 9 full bath(s)/4 half bath(s) , 4 car attached garage and approximately 13795 square feet of living area. Rooms include family room. Features include view, private pool, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Wimbish-Riteway Re Lic. Real Estate Broker

residential_listing_-_feature_details.location: Canal front, Bay front, Water front

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Balcony, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Central Vacuum, Dishwasher,Elevator, Outdoor Grill, Outdoor Lights, Walk-In Closet(s)
